content.rendered:
STEDI BA15D Bayonet LED Light Conversion Globe in Dual Filament which has full brightness / dim function and compatible with brake lights & DRLs (daytime running lights) which require 2 separate levels of brightness.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

COMING SOON

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

If you’re tired of chaning out those dull and unreliable halogen bulbs, our BAY15D LED is your solution.

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES | BAY15D

  • CANBUS friendly – Error free operation for 98% of vehicles
  • Not Polarity Sensitive – our BA15D wont fail if you plug them in the wrong way.
  • Constant Current circuit – Avoids compromising LED life & provides consistent illumination across all LEDs
  • Compatible from 9v to 30v circuits.
  • 20 SMD LED for uniform light distribution

BAY15D is also referred to as and replaces  1157, P21/5W, BAZ15D, BA15D

COMMON USES FOR BA15D GLOBES

  • Tail Lights
  • Parker Lights
  • Brake Lights

Sold in packs of 2

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 3030 x 20
POWER 0.2a @ 13.6v
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Compatible
CONNECTOR TYPE 1157, P21/5W, BAZ15D, BA15D
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x BAY15D

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
